Summary: four fire like sphere's in sky like they were looking for something.
divs: Sighting Detailsfour fire like sphere's between wrenwood and fox roads on 6-22-13. around8:30 pm.They glowed like yellow fire. One looked like it had a red object going around it. One came to a complete stop, then took off super fast. I also have to say these ufo's were dead silent. My wife and son also witnessed this sighting.
